title: Mistral Large 2 emission per request (Mistral AI)
description: Mistral AI, in collaboration with Carbone 4 and ADEME, and peer-reviewed by Resilio and Hubblo, conducted a lifecycle analysis (LCA) of their Mistral Large 2 model to assess its environmental impacts. Regarding GHG emissions during model inference, they found that generating a 400-token response (approximately one page of text), results in about 1.14 g CO2e, excluding user terminals.
